name: Hangover
description: Hangover is a story rich adventure with multiple endings. You wake up after a party in a mess and realize that you need to get to work in an hour!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: Any CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Works almost on anything
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
